name: security
params: Badmintonbuddy DRIVE is SAFE and SECURE.
We understand the importance of your academy data and assure you data security and it is only accessed by your team !!

name: team-add(video)
params: You can add your team (coach/admin/staff) and set the right permissions.
Control what they see in the APP !!

name: attendance-add(video)
params: Attendance takes just few seconds with Badmintonbuddy DRIVE.
Swipe right for present, swipe left for absent. It's that simple !!
